long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Kalp Wallet app is your go-to wallet for actualizing all your transactions on the Kalp Network. It allows you to send and manage your digital assets across the Kalp ecosystem and make transactions across the Kalp network.
